find_large_files.description: Finds files larger than 100MB in current directory and shows their size in human-readable format.

list_files.description: Lists all files in the current directory with detailed information including permissions, ownership, size, and modification time. The -a flag shows hidden files and the -l flag provides a long format listing.

disk_usage.description: Shows disk usage in human-readable format sorted by size, displaying only the top-level directories and files.

compress_directory.description: Creates a gzip-compressed tar archive of the current directory.

delete_all.description: This operation is unsafe and cannot be previewed.
